titles.title: High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2019
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to classify certain automatic fire sprinkler system retrofits as 15-year property for purposes of depreciation.
High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2019
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to classify any automatic fire sprinkler system retrofit property as 15-year property for purposes of accelerated depreciation.
